altername_name: The Penguins of Madagascar: Dr. Blowhole Returns
Los Pinguinos de Madagascar: El Regreso del Doctor Espiraculo
name: The Penguins of Madagascar: Dr. Blowhole Returns Again!
overview: Dr. Blowhole is out to take over the world and only Team Penguin can foil his diabolical plans! Jump into an all-new adventure with 3 unique game episodes and over 12 exciting levels. Lead Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private as you commence super-secret missions in, under and outside of the zoo, culminating in the grand finale in Dr. Blowhole’s Lair. Solve perilous puzzles, build crazy contraptions, nimbly navigate hazards, play through a multitude of mini-games and rescue Marlene, Mort, and the rest of the zoo crew in your mission to save the world.
